text: Came a Hot Friday is a 1985 New Zealand comedy movie directed by first time director Ian Mune and was based on the 1964 novel by Ronald Hugh Morrieson. It stars Billy T. James, Peter Bland, Marshall Napier, Don Selwyn, Prince Tui Teka, Roy Billing and Bruce Allpress. ==Other websites== * * Came a Hot Friday at Rotten Tomatoes website * Came A Hot Friday at NZonScreen (with video extracts) Category:1985 comedy movies Category:New Zealand comedy movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies set in the 1940s Category:Movies directed by Ian Mune
title: Came a Hot Friday
